MS MCQs

    Meet the growing demand for transparency, privacy, and compliance with Microsoft 365

    »

    1. What are the key benefits of Microsoft Compliance Manager?

      Malware protection, application monitoring, and building access.

      Data analysis and assistance with fine payment for non-compliance.

      Ongoing risk assessment, actionable insights, and simplified compliance.

      Two-factor authentication, data labelling, and virus protection.


    2. What are the three phases of the compliance process?

      Assess, protect, and respond.

      Identify, protect, and secure.

      Comply, assess, and govern.

      Assess, respond, and return.


    3. Finish the sentence. Without an integrated and intelligent compliance solution like Microsoft 365, ______.

      Your information will be so protected that you are exempt from GDPR, even if you operate in the EU.

      You won’t be able to fully assess your risk, protect your information, and respond to compliance requests.

      You will have comprehensive information due to many, disparate sources.

      You are subject to a significantly greater number of compliance obligations.
